message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to me, and I think it would be very valuable to you as well. I'm offering it to you for $13,000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $11,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $12,000? This would still be a great deal for you, and it gets me closer to what I need.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for the product.
Bob, I see we're both trying to find a good middle ground here. I'm willing to go down a little further to $11,500.  This is a fair price for both of us, and it would be a great investment for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. I'd be willing to pay $10,750 for the product.

Bob, we're getting close! I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,125.  This is a great opportunity for you to own this valuable product, and it gets me closer to my target price.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to save a bit more. I'd be willing to pay $10,750 for the product.
